networked_experiments

Class ClassifierRegistrationOpenML

  • java.lang.Object
    • networked_experiments.ClassifierRegistrationOpenML

  • public class ClassifierRegistrationOpenML
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the classifier registration and parameter registration for experiments used with OpenML-fetched data, in order to be able to upload the results of the experiments back to the servers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • getVersionString

        public java.lang.String getVersionString(ValidateableInterface classifier)
        This method produces the current algorithm version for the OpenML archive. It currently relies on the serial UID, which is an initial option. TODO: Introduce more precise version control.
        Parameters:
        classifier - ValidateableInterface that is the classifier used in OpenML-driven experiments.
        Returns:
        String that is the version string of the classifier.

      • getImplementationId

        public static int getImplementationId(org.openml.apiconnector.xml.Implementation implementation,
                      java.lang.Class classifierClass,
                      java.io.File hubMinerSourceDir,
                      org.openml.apiconnector.io.OpenmlConnector client)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method returns the implementation ID from the OpenML servers, if it was registered.
        Parameters:
        implementation - Implementation corresponding the the classifier.
        classifier - classifierClass Class of the algorithm used in classification.
        client - OpenmlConnector client for communicating with OpenML.
        Returns:
        Integer that is the implementation ID obtained from the OpenML servers.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • create

        public static org.openml.apiconnector.xml.Implementation create(java.lang.Class classifierClass,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameterDescriptions)
                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates an implementation object with the specified parameter descriptions.
        Parameters:
        classifierClass - Class that is the class of the classifier.
        parameterDescriptions - HashMap mapping parameter names to parameter descriptions.
        Returns:
        Implementation that corresponds to the specified classifier class and the specified list of parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getParameterSetting

        public static java.util.ArrayList<org.openml.apiconnector.xml.Run.Parameter_setting> getParameterSetting(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> paramValuesMap,
                                                                                         org.openml.apiconnector.xml.Implementation imp)
        This method gets the list of current parameter values restricted on the definitions in the implementation object.
        Parameters:
        paramValuesMap - HashMap mapping parameter names to their current values.
        imp - Implementation that holds the parametrization definitions.
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the current parameter values.

        This method gets the list of current parameter values restricted on the definitions in the implementation object.
